DataElement.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material Grandfather Clause Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A substance consumed by humans and animals for nutritional purposes. EXAMPLE(S): broccoli, donuts, pet treats Specifies whether the product qualifies under the 1938 Grandfather Clause, contained in section 20l(p)(l) of the U.S. Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material Grandfather Clause Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._An exemption based on circumstances existing prior to the adoption of some policy.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Food or Food Substance Product Material
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Processed or unprocessed substances obtained from animal, plant, microorganism and mining source that provide nutrients for living organisms to maintain biological processes or functions.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: An exemption based on circumstances existing prior to the adoption of some policy.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: An exemption based on circumstances existing prior to the adoption of some policy.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
